title: Sydney Morning Herald: «‘With full force’: Israel rejects US, Australian backed ceasefire plan» - Related news - Newstral.com
text: Newstral Article [Sydney Morning Herald](/en/sources/228) on 2024-09-26 21:52 ‘With full force’: Israel rejects US, Australian backed ceasefire plan Related news [Netanyahu rejects calls for ceasefire as battle continues with ‘full force’](https://www.expressandstar.com/news/world-news/2023/11/11/netanyahu-rejects-calls-for-ceasefire-as-battle-continues-with-full-force/)[expressandstar.com](/en/sources/30252),,,,[Israel rejects U.S.-backed Lebanon ceasefire proposal](https://www.staradvertiser.com/2024/09/26/breaking-news/israel-rejects-u-s-backed-lebanon-ceasefire-proposal/)[staradvertiser.com](/en/sources/28484)[Netanyahu vows to use ‘full force’ against Hezbollah and dims ceasefire hopes](https://www.shropshirestar.com/news/world-news/2024/09/26/netanyahu-vows-to-use-full-force-against-hezbollah-and-dims-ceasefire-hopes/)[Shropshire Star](/en/sources/30276)[Netanyahu rejects calls for ceasefire, says Israel’s battle against Hamas will continue with ‘full force’](https://www.scmp.com/news/world/middle-east/article/3241228/netanyahu-rejects-calls-ceasefire-says-israels-battle-against-hamas-will-continue-full-force?utm_source=rss_feed)[South China Morning Post](/en/sources/238),,,,[Netanyahu Says Gaza Military Campaign Will Continue ‘Full Force’ As UN Chief Calls For Immediate Ceasefire](https://www.forbes.com/sites/jemimamcevoy/2021/05/16/netanyahu-says-gaza-military-campaign-will-continue-full-force-as-un-chief-calls-for-immediate-ceasefire/)[Forbes](/en/sources/2783)[Israel's Palestinian state as Israel rejects
